name: manim
description: Animation engine for explanatory math videos
unavailable_reason: Repository manimCommunity/manim not accessible (may be private, deleted, or renamed)

readme.summary: Excellent clarity and quick start with a complete working example, but lacks inline troubleshooting guidance and configuration details rely heavily on external documentation.
readme.top_issue: No troubleshooting section in README - common issues like dependency conflicts, rendering errors, or platform-specific problems are not addressed inline

common_complaints: Animation and transformation bugs (FadeOut, TransformFromCopy, LaggedStartMap)
Positioning and coordinate system issues (ThreeDScene, Angle value tracking)
Type-specific bugs causing crashes or unexpected behavior
sentiment.summary: Manim shows moderate community health with active bug reporting and recent fixes, though recurring animation system issues and recent regression in v0.19.1 suggest ongoing stability challenges.

concerns: No commits in the past 6 months despite last commit being very recent (2026-01-10)
482 open issues with no closed issues in past 6 months indicates issues are not being triaged
Zero active contributors in the past 6 months
No merged PRs in the past 6 months suggests review and integration of changes has stopped
Unknown last release date suggests release process has stalled
positive_signals: Recent commit activity on 2026-01-10 suggests repository is not completely dormant
maintenance.summary: The manim package appears abandoned with no meaningful maintenance activity over 6 months despite recent commit metadata, indicating the repository may be inactive or the commit timestamp is unreliable.

project_metrics.description: A community-maintained Python framework for creating mathematical animations.
